https://tmrev.io/movie/847609-Downtown Eastside 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rpgNJDfvXzS9xSwOZvCKmexVSuh.jpg The artist records everyday activities in the streets and alleys around the Main and Hasting Street intersection. On the right, the view is from a fixed camera positioned on top of a dashboard in a moving car. On the left, he walks with a handheld camera with a wide angle lens. Along the way he encounters a street artist, engages with two women in Pigeon Park, crack users, dealers and homeless people. Downtown Eastside
